mapper.insert:
insert into reportimagekikisystem(koujiId, imagename, kikiSysId) values
( #{i.koujiId}, #{i.imagename}, #{i.kikiSysId} )
insert into reportimagekikisystem (koujiId, imagename, kikiSysId,kikiSysPage) values ( #{koujiId}, #{imagename}, #{kikiSysId}, #{kikiSysPage} )
mapper.select: select * from reportimagekikisystem where koujiId=#{koujiId} and imagename=#{imagename}
select kikiSysId from reportimagekikisystem where koujiId=#{koujiId} and imagename=#{imagename}
select * from reportimagekikisystem where kikiSysId=#{kikiSysId} order by kikiSysPage
mapper.delete: delete from reportimagekikisystem where koujiId=#{koujiId} and imagename=#{imagename}
delete from reportimagekikisystem where koujiId=#{koujiId} and kikiSysId=#{kikiSysId}
delete from reportimagekikisystem where imagename=#{imagename} and kikiSysId=#{kikiSysId}
mapper.update: UPDATE reportimagekikisystem SET kikiSysPage=#{kikiSysPage} WHERE id=#{id}
